website_summaries.verdict: An at-home toddler splash pad best for one or two kids. Be sure to use it on grass rather than a hard surface.
pros: Gentle spray and size indicated for very young children
Toddler play mat sprays water from its edge and fountains
Measures almost 5 feet across by 3.5 feet
Sized for one or two toddlers to play
Easy to attach hose with fixture
cons: Some say the mat is smaller than they expected

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: It’s an ok product and may be fun for kids but it’s not as sturdy as shown in the pictures, the fountain that’s supposed to come out of a frog doesn’t do anything and the little sprays are coming up not higher than my 1 year old’s knees when the picture shows them much higher. I would recommend it for 1/2 the price but not for what it costs.
customer_reviews.author: Ksenia V

customer_reviews.title: Not at all as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected, water sprinkles very low, not happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: Sassy

customer_reviews.title: Just ok, shipping too long
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than what I was expecting and the kids weren’t too impressed. It’s ok, I would probably buy a different sprinkler mat next time. Took way too long to be shipped, wasn’t worth the wait.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlie Oxford

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I was looking far and a great value what what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected but great buy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this - I do wish the splash pad part itself was a little bigger (the picture isn't representative of its true size) but my kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Smaller then it looks
customer_reviews.text: This works great but way smaller then the picture makes it appear.
customer_reviews.author: Jo D.

customer_reviews.title: Misleading photo on packaging
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely disappointed. Was so small. Completely misleading from the photo. Had to request refund.
customer_reviews.author: Granna Mac

customer_reviews.title: fun and cute
customer_reviews.text: easy to use easy to set up easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Meghan M, N.J.

customer_reviews.title: Nice summer sprinkler
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boys and they loved it, it was an easy hook up to the hose and there was automatic sprinkler fun!!!
customer_reviews.author: Twinsonboard

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my grandsons first birthday. It came sooner then expected and he loved it this past summer. I do think that it will be something he can play on next year too so it was a win for us.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Derbique

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for little kiddos. It’s finally warm enough to use it where we live and my 16 month old couldn’t get enough!
customer_reviews.author: Megan VanderHulst

product_meta.title: BANZAI Froggy Pond Splash Mat
product_meta.description: Splish-splash with your Froggy friends in the Froggy pond splash mat. The shallow splash mat features a water filled sprinkling rim and inflatable Froggy fountain. Little ones can press on the stomp pad to play with the flow of the Froggy fountain. Comes with splash mat and repair patch. Durable PVC construction.
feature_bullets: Refreshing water sprinkling rim and frog fountain.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars138 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
